statusDetails.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://hr-challenge.dev.tapyou.com/api/test/user/99999999999

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 400: Bad Request

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: GET
URL: https://hr-challenge.dev.tapyou.com/api/test/user/99999999999
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/125.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate"
}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 400 - Bad Request
Headers: {
  "date": "Sun, 02 Jun 2024 17:25:51 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
  "transfer-encoding": "chunked",
  "connection": "keep-alive"
}
Body: {
  "isSuccess": false,
  "errorCode": 400,
  "errorMessage": "NumberFormatException: For input string: \"99999999999\"",
  "user": null
}
